mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.client_id, c.client_name, c.client_type, c.client_email, c.client_mobile, c.client_tel, ou.user_name as opt_name, au.user_name AS approve_name, t.task_type, t.task_status,t.create_date FROM tt_task t LEFT JOIN tm_client c ON t.client_id = c.client_id LEFT JOIN tm_user ou ON c.opt_id = ou.user_id LEFT JOIN tm_user au ON c.approve_id = au.user_id WHERE t.is_delete = ${@com.neplus.erp.dictionary.Fixcode@IF_TYPE_NO.getCode()} AND task_id = #{_parameter}

SELECT tp.process_id, tp.task_id, tp.opt_date, tp.opt_by, u.user_name AS opt_name, tp.task_status_from, tp.task_status_to, tp.`comment`, tp.file_id, f.file_name, f.file_path, u.avatar FROM tt_task_process tp LEFT JOIN tm_user u ON tp.opt_by = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tm_file f ON tp.file_id = f.file_id WHERE tp.is_delete = ${@com.neplus.erp.dictionary.Fixcode@IF_TYPE_NO.getCode()} AND tp.task_id = #{_parameter} ORDER BY tp.create_date, tp.process_id ASC
